```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE,
	rows.print=5
)

options(tibble.max_extra_cols = 5, tibble.print_max = 5)

library(fs) # cross-platform file system operations
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

Loading all datasets
```{r}
agri <- read_csv(path("01_Agriculture/Agridata_Cleaned_nopunjab.csv"))
nfhs2015 <- read_csv(path("02_Nutrition/NFHS2015_Cleaned.csv"))
districts <- read_csv(path("03_Geodata/Geodata_Cleaned.csv"))
```


```{r}
merged_data <- merge(agri, nfhs2015, by.x = "district", by.y = "district")
merged_data <- merge(merged_data, districts, by.x = "district", by.y = "district")
```
